QuestData.Title: The Conquest Pit: Mad Furbolg Fighting
QuestData.Description: You're not bad. Not bad at all.$B$BThink you can take a furbolg? What about one of those extra-large crazed Northrend furbolgs?$B$BGood, good. Get your crew together, and head to the ring. Let's give these folks a show... maybe we can earn some more coin while we're at it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Torgg Thundertotem inside the Conquest Pit and speak to Bookie Vel'jen for a reward.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bookie Vel'jen at Conquest Hold in Grizzly Hills.
QuestData.CompletionText: It's not over until you or the furbolg tips over, friend!
QuestData.RewardText: Those were some sharp moves, friend! Lots of bets against you, which is good news cash-wise!
